data.title: Little Red Riding Hood's Zombie BBQ
data.meta_description: Read reviews and ratings of Little Red Riding Hood's Zombie BBQ from our experts, and see what our community says, too!
data.text:
GameSpot Reviews

5.5

Mediocre

Little Red Riding Hood's Zombie BBQ Review

Pesky controls and irritating slowdown curtail the fun you'll have in this zombie shooter.

What Gamespot Users have to say about Little Red Riding Hood's Zombie BBQ

Rating:7

A decent shooting game with a great theme, let down by a poor frame-rate

Little Red Riding Hood and ninja accomplice Momotaro travel through Fairy Tale Land, mauling through the zombie-infected citizens as they try to end the plague that has taken over their land. On their journey, they will... Read Full Review

1 of 1 users found the following review helpful

Rating:8

Zombies in Fairytale Land

The zombie sub genere hasn't shown signs of slowing down yet; it seems like you can just about make any game about them these days. This under the radar cult gem is another soild and bizzare entry, it's also one for the... Read Full Review

0 of 0 users found the following review helpful

Rating:8

Zombie BBQ is an excellent game that everyone should look into!

Little Red Riding Hood's Zombie BBQ is an excellent little old school shooter that has not been done yet on the DS. I knew I wanted this game just from the album art, the name, and bargain bin price. I really didn't expe... Read Full Review

Rating:7.5

Gamespot should really re-look this games rating

Little Red Riding Hood zombie BBQ .... This game was a definite gamble since i don't trust many cheap games to be good, but after playing this little 5$ gem for my ds im going to change my price theory what can i say... Read Full Review

Rating:7.5

Quite a literal approach to the words "Zombie BBQ"

Good game when you know what to look at
